name: Shattered Lights
description:
Using non-euclidean geometry we can make sure that every single step you take, is purely physical and you’ll never once have to use controllers to move around, even so, you’ll be able to explore intricate areas, impossible geometry and any situation that Shattered Lights will throw you in. You will be armed with nothing but one flashlight and your sanity.

You will be descending down in an underground medical facility, using whatever light you have available to fend off whatever horrors might be lurking in the darkness around you.
